rows.EIGENFORM TRACKER: Self-referential patterns that reproduce themselves. Good loops vs bad loops.
THE CONCEPT
An eigenform is a pattern that recreates itself through its own operation.
Some eigenforms are virtuous (success breeds success). Some are vicious (failure breeds failure).
Identify them. Amplify the good ones. Break the bad ones.
VIRTUOUS EIGENFORMS (Amplify These)
Pattern
Good reviews → More sales → More reviews
Profitable CAC → More budget → More data → Better CAC
Good content → Organic traffic → Email list → More content ideas
Happy customers → Referrals → Similar customers → Happy customers
Documentation → Faster onboarding → More capacity → Better docs
VICIOUS EIGENFORMS (Break These)
Pattern
Stockout → Lost sales → Cash crunch → Can't reorder → Stockout
Bad reviews → Lower conversion → Higher CAC → Desperation → Bad experience
Overwork → Mistakes → More work to fix → More overwork
Unclear roles → Confusion → Rework → More confusion
Technical debt → Slower shipping → More shortcuts → More debt
EIGENFORM INTERVENTION
To AMPLIFY virtuous: Identify leverage point, invest resources there
To BREAK vicious: Identify the weakest link in the loop, intervene there
Example: Inventory death spiral → Break at 'Can't reorder' by maintaining cash reserve
